SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNSYSTEMCNTC A , ( SELECT CNTC_ID CNTC_ID , SUM( CASE TRSMRCV_SE_CODE WHEN 'S01' THEN 1 WHEN 'S04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CNT_ALL , SUM( CASE TRSMRCV_SE_CODE WHEN 'S02' THEN 1 WHEN 'S05' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CNT_SUCCESS , SUM( CASE TRSMRCV_SE_CODE WHEN 'S03' THEN 1 WHEN 'S06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CNT_FAIL FROM COMTNTRSMRCVLOG GROUP BY CNTC_ID ) B , COMTNCNTCINSTT C1 , COMTNCNTCINSTT C2 , COMTNCNTCSYSTEM D1 , COMTNCNTCSYSTEM D2 , COMTNCNTCSERVICE E WHERE A.CNTC_ID = B.CNTC_ID AND A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = C1.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = D1.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_SYS_ID = D1.SYS_ID AND A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = E.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_SYS_ID = E.SYS_ID AND A.PROVD_SVC_ID = E.SVC_ID AND A.REQUST_INSTT_ID = C2.INSTT_ID AND A.REQUST_INSTT_ID = D2.INSTT_ID AND A.REQUST_SYS_ID = D2.SYS_ID
A.CNTC_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT A.CNTC_ID cntcId , A.CNTC_NM cntcNm , A.CNTC_TY cntcType , B.CNT_ALL cntAll , B.CNT_SUCCESS cntSuccess , B.CNT_FAIL cntFail , A.PROVD_INSTT_ID provdInsttId , A.PROVD_SYS_ID provdSysId , A.PROVD_SVC_ID provdSvcId , A.REQUST_INSTT_ID requstInsttId , A.REQUST_SYS_ID requstSysId , C1.INSTT_NM provdInsttNm , D1.SYS_NM provdSysNm , E.SVC_NM provdSvcNm , C2.INSTT_NM requstInsttNm , D2.SYS_NM requstSysNm FROM COMTNSYSTEMCNTC A , ( SELECT CNTC_ID CNTC_ID , SUM( CASE TRSMRCV_SE_CODE WHEN 'S01' THEN 1 WHEN 'S04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CNT_ALL , SUM( CASE TRSMRCV_SE_CODE WHEN 'S02' THEN 1 WHEN 'S05' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CNT_SUCCESS , SUM( CASE TRSMRCV_SE_CODE WHEN 'S03' THEN 1 WHEN 'S06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CNT_FAIL FROM COMTNTRSMRCVLOG GROUP BY CNTC_ID ) B , COMTNCNTCINSTT C1 , COMTNCNTCINSTT C2 , COMTNCNTCSYSTEM D1 , COMTNCNTCSYSTEM D2 , COMTNCNTCSERVICE E WHERE A.CNTC_ID = B.CNTC_ID AND A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = C1.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = D1.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_SYS_ID = D1.SYS_ID AND A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = E.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_SYS_ID = E.SYS_ID AND A.PROVD_SVC_ID = E.SVC_ID AND A.REQUST_INSTT_ID = C2.INSTT_ID AND A.REQUST_INSTT_ID = D2.INSTT_ID AND A.REQUST_SYS_ID = D2.SYS_ID AND A.CNTC_ID = #cntcId#
